attributes.action: TELL US how many taxpayer pounds have been GIVEN to the Police Federation since it was formed.
attributes.additional_details: It is reliably reported that PF cash reserves are in the region of 30 million pounds, which it is assumed will now be used to defy change and fund activity detrimental to the welfare of the taxpayers of this land.  It is for this reason that ANY TAXPAYER POUNDS given to the Police Federation MUST be recovered from them and recovered from them VERY QUICKLY to prevent them being used for activity it was never intended they were to be used for.
